programme.title: Operation Desert Fox begins
programme.short_synopsis: As the UN is refused access to weapons sites in Iraq, Operation Desert Fox begins.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Operation Desert Fox bombing campaign begins in Iraq after the UN is refused access to weapons sites and Congress ponders whether Clinton should face an impeachment trial.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
